transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Good afternoon. Anshika baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se. Aaj baat ho rahi thi aap se.
Executive: Haan haan, boliye.
Customer: Mam actually aap se discussion hua tha na aapka feedback aaya hai Meten Met Innovations Private Limited wali company se. Aur to actually hamare discussion to auto auto auto ke regarding hua tha. Yes yes.
Executive: Yes to ye Meten Met se kaise feedback aaya hai? To wo by mistake hua hai.
Customer: By mistake?
Executive: Matlab mujhe auto auto ka feedback dena tha. To wo Meten Met ka ho gaya.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Aap socha theek hai to main Meten Met wala jo ye hai na feedback isko main close karungi to aapke paas iska feedback aayega.
Customer: Hmm sorry. Haan haan theek hai chalega bhej do. Main na aur baki Meten Met wale services mein koi dikkat to nahi aa rahi aapko?
Executive: Meten Met mein service mein dikkat nahi aa rahi but auto auto mein aap mujhe leads dene wale the na aaj. Haan haan main bolti hu.
Customer: Even na humne abhi just after aapke conversation ke baad mein na humne kuch naye products bhi add matlab keywords bhi usme add on kiye aap check karoge. To pehle jo nine products dikha rahe the ab wo badh kar ke I think 15 to 16 ho gaye hain. To aap matlab usme hum kaam kar rahe hain unme add on karwa diye the turant ke turant. Abhi main Sushmita ko bol kar ke na uski jo leads wagera hai wo bhi aapko share kara deti hu.
Executive: At least ek baar mujhe trial ke liye aaj ek denge na to main dekh leti hu.
Customer: Theek hai to main ek screenshot bhijwa du aapko?
Executive: Haan mujhe ek baar trial to dene matlab de do na kaisa hai.
Executive: Google Meet?
Customer: Nahi nahi. Aur leads images?
Executive: Mam aapki thodi aawaz sahi se nahi aa rahi mujhe.
Customer: Inquiry de do inquiry. Achcha inquiry. Okay okay haan wo main bhijwa rahi hu.
Executive: Okay mam thank you.

(silence)

Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received feedback request for wrong company.

- Customer wants leads for Auto Auto service.



Resolution:

- Executive will close the wrong feedback request.

- Executive added new keywords to increase product visibility.

- Executive will share leads with the customer.

- Executive agreed to send inquiry details to customer.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, leads, auto auto, inquiry
